description.emerald:
A powdery attack that may
raise abilities.
description.ruby-sapphire:
A powdery attack that may
raise abilities.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is attacked
with a silver dust.
It may raise all
the user’s stats.
description.diamond-pearl:
The foe is attacked
with powdery scales
blown by wind.
It may also raise all
the user’s stats.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
